Effect of Exchange Rate Changes: effect of exchange rate on cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents including disposal group and discontinued operations

Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
increase decrease in unsettled repurchases common stock
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from debt net of issuance costs
proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from issuance of senior long term debt
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper
proceeds from repayments of commercial paper and other short- term financing
proceeds from sale of available for sale securities debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
Capital Expenditures: payments to acquire property plant and equipment
capital expenditures incurred but not yet paid
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale maturity and collections of investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable and other operating liabilities
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in contract with customer liability
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
increase decrease in unsettled investment sales
increase decrease in unsettled purchases of marketable securities
Deferred Income Taxes: deferred tax expense from stock options exercised
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities
Other Non-Cash Items: gains from investments and other net

__unmapped__: business combination consideration transferred equity interests issued and issuable
